subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Wilson Chandler had 31 points and Amar’e Stoudemire and Raymond Felton added 28 each as the Knicks improved to 20-14 at the expense of the Spurs, who have the league’s best record.
snippet: Wilson Chandler had 31 points and Amar’e Stoudemire and Raymond Felton added 28 each as the Knicks improved to 20-14 at the expense of the Spurs, who have the league’s best record.
